content: the sleeves the body markers will be color coded blue and the sleeve markers will be color coded green in the rest of the pattern raglan setup k 20 23 24 26 29 30 32 35 36 38 place m1 k1 place m2 k 34 36 38 40 40 44 46 46 50 52 place m3 k1 place m4 k 40 46 50 54 62 64 68 74 76 80 place m5 k1 place m6 k 34 36 38 40 40 44 46 46 50 52 place m7 k1 place m8 k 20 23 24 26 29 30 32 35 36 38 to bor marker you should now have a total of nine stitch markers where the eight markers you just placed divide your stitches into four distinct sections double check your counts with the diagram below you should have 40 46 48 52 58 60 64 70 72 76 stitches between m1 and m8 back 34 36 38 40 40 44 46 46 50 52 stitches between m2 and m3 right sleeve 40 46 50 54 62 64 68 74 76 80 stitches between m4 and m5 front and 34 36 38 40 40 44 46 46 50 52 stitches between m6 and m7 left sleeve you should have a single stitch between each section these are your raglan stitches front 40 46 50 54 62 64 68 74 76 80 st m5 m4 m6 m3 1 st 1 st left sleeve right sleeve 34 36 38 40 40 44 34 36 38 40 40 44 46 46 50 52 st 46 46 50 52 st 1 st 1 st bor m7 m2 m8 m1 back 40 46 48 52 58 60 64 70 72 76 st em knits © copyright 2025 3 the regina pullover yoke cont d you will now work the raglan increases you will first work increases on all markers all markers are treated the same and will be referred to as sm instead of their label sizes 1-5 will then only work increases on the body sizes 6-10 will increase the number of increases worked on the body while continuing the sleeve increases and then only work the increases on the body r1 *k to sm m1r sl sm k1 sl sm m1l* repeat from * to * 3 more times k to bor marker 8 st increased r2 k around slipping sm as they are reached work r1-2 another 2 2 2 2 3 1 3 2 3 4 times you should now have a total of 176 192 202 214 236 232 260 264 284 304 st on your needles with 46 52 56 60 70 68 76 80 84 90 st on the front 46 52 54 58 66 64 72 76 80 86 st on the back and 40 42 44 46 48 48 54 52 58 62 st on each sleeve sizes 1-5 only r3 k to m1 m1r sl m1 k1 sl m2 k to and sl m3
